name: Just a Stroll
description:
“I just wanted to go and buy more bread!”
  - It McMorningroll, 2020

For It this was just a stroll in the park until bloodthirsty pigeons starting attacking him. Now you have to keep It alive! 

Kill the pigeons by throwing stones. Throw them some breadcrumbs to temporarily stop them from following It. It has an unlimited number of stones but only three portions of breadcrumbs. Walking over rocks will slow It down, so be careful.

Controls

  • MOVE: W/A/S/D or Arrows
  • Aiming: mouse
  • Throw stones: left mouse button
  • Throw bread: right mouse button
  • Exit: press Esc twice

Scoring

10 points per bird multiplied by accuracy. Yes, you will use points if you throw stones that miss. It's better to throw less stones but accurately.
